name: AmberCityDemo
description:
AmberCity,

After a series of unfortunate events, you Senne, are in charge of transporting "chocolateboxes" in AmberCity to the Mayor of AmberCity. Unfortunatly it is not all that legal, and the authorities are after you. 

Can you outsmart them?

When you like the demo, don't forget to check the full game with loads more features.

https://ollibolli.itch.io/ambercityfullgame
